channel.title: cosmetics on Logotyp.us
channel.description: Recent content in cosmetics on Logotyp.us

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
AVEDA Logo
Aveda Corporation is an American cosmetics company founded by Horst Rechelbacher, now owned by Estée Lauder Companies, headquartered in the Minneapolis suburb of Blaine, Minnesota. Aveda manufactures skin and body care, cosmetics, perfume, hair color, and hair care products, and trains students in cosmetology, massage, and esthiology at the Aveda Institutes in Minneapolis, New York City, Des Moines, Washington, D.C., Maryland, Vancouver, Calgary, Orlando, Denver, Toronto, and many other cities.
You can download theAVEDAlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: AVEDA
item.description: Aveda Corporation is an American cosmetics company founded by Horst Rechelbacher, now owned by Estée Lauder Companies, headquartered in the Minneapolis suburb of Blaine, Minnesota. Aveda manufactures skin and body care, cosmetics, perfume, hair color, and hair care products, and trains students in cosmetology, massage, and esthiology at the Aveda Institutes in Minneapolis, New York City, Des Moines, Washington, D.C., Maryland, Vancouver, Calgary, Orlando, Denver, Toronto, and many other cities.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 dm-drogerie markt Logo
dm-drogerie markt is a chain of retail stores headquartered in Karlsruhe, Germany, offering cosmetics, healthcare items, household products and health food and drinks. The company was founded in 1973 when it opened its first store in Karlsruhe. In its industry sector, dm-drogerie markt is Germany’s largest retailer measured by revenues. The company is known for its flat hierarchical structures and high level of social commitment. Götz Werner claims that the well-being of employees is more important than the company’s returns.
You can download theDMlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >

item.description: dm-drogerie markt is a chain of retail stores headquartered in Karlsruhe, Germany, offering cosmetics, healthcare items, household products and health food and drinks. The company was founded in 1973 when it opened its first store in Karlsruhe. In its industry sector, dm-drogerie markt is Germany’s largest retailer measured by revenues. The company is known for its flat hierarchical structures and high level of social commitment. Götz Werner claims that the well-being of employees is more important than the company’s returns.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Lancome Logo Lancôme is a French luxury perfumes and cosmetics house that distributes products internationally. Lancôme is part of the L’Oréal Luxury Products division, which is its parent company and offers luxury skin care, fragrances, and makeup at higher-end prices. Source
You can download theLancomelogo on full-version of the page. ]] >
item.title: Lancome
item.description: Lancôme is a French luxury perfumes and cosmetics house that distributes products internationally. Lancôme is part of the L’Oréal Luxury Products division, which is its parent company and offers luxury skin care, fragrances, and makeup at higher-end prices. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 L'Oréal Logo
L’Oréal S.A. is a French personal care company headquartered in Clichy, Hauts-de-Seine with a registered office in Paris. It is the world’s largest cosmetics company and has developed activities in the field concentrating on hair colour, skin care, sun protection, make-up, perfume, and hair care. Source Loreal is a world chief in the creation of a broad scope of beautifiers. The organization claims numerous famous brands occupied with the assembling of scents, enlivening, and care items for face, body, and hair.
You can download theLOreallogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: LOreal
item.description: L’Oréal S.A. is a French personal care company headquartered in Clichy, Hauts-de-Seine with a registered office in Paris. It is the world’s largest cosmetics company and has developed activities in the field concentrating on hair colour, skin care, sun protection, make-up, perfume, and hair care. Source Loreal is a world chief in the creation of a broad scope of beautifiers. The organization claims numerous famous brands occupied with the assembling of scents, enlivening, and care items for face, body, and hair.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 Shiseido (資生堂) Logo
Shiseido Company, Limited is a Japanese multinational personal care company, that is a skin care, hair care, cosmetics and fragrance producer. It is one of the oldest cosmetics companies in the world. Founded in 1872, it celebrated its 140th anniversary in 2012. It is the largest cosmetic firm in Japan and the fifth largest cosmetics company in the world.[Shiseido is only available at cosmetic counters at selected department stores or pharmacists.
You can download theShiseidologo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Shiseido
item.description: Shiseido Company, Limited is a Japanese multinational personal care company, that is a skin care, hair care, cosmetics and fragrance producer. It is one of the oldest cosmetics companies in the world. Founded in 1872, it celebrated its 140th anniversary in 2012. It is the largest cosmetic firm in Japan and the fifth largest cosmetics company in the world.[Shiseido is only available at cosmetic counters at selected department stores or pharmacists.
